judul: Python Object-Oriented Programming: Classes and Inheritance
konten: Object-oriented programming (OOP) in Python involves creating classes and defining objects...

contoh.komentar: Defines a Person class with attributes and a method.

topik.deskripsi: Membuat dan menggunakan kelas serta pewarisan dalam pemrograman berorientasi objek menggunakan Python.

error.deskripsi: AttributeError occurred due to accessing non-existent attribute in an object.
error.solusi: Ensure attribute 'email' is defined in the Person class or object.

judul: Python Machine Learning: Introduction to TensorFlow
konten: TensorFlow is a powerful open-source library for machine learning and deep learning tasks...

contoh.isi:
import tensorflow as tf

# Define a simple neural network
model = tf.keras.Sequential([
    tf.keras.layers.Dense(10, activation='relu', input_shape=(784,)),
    tf.keras.layers.Dense(10, activation='softmax')
])

# Compile the model
model.compile(optimizer='adam', loss='sparse_categorical_crossentropy', metrics=['accuracy'])
contoh.komentar: Defines a simple neural network using TensorFlow.

topik.topik: Machine Learning dengan TensorFlow dalam Python
topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan TensorFlow untuk tugas-tugas machine learning dan deep learning.

highlight: powerful open-source library for machine learning

error.deskripsi: ModuleNotFoundError occurred due to missing TensorFlow installation.
